TestEvalQA9.question: Which tasks are explored in this paper?
TestEvalQA9.ground_truth: We have conducted experiments to compare SLRTM with several strong topic model baselines on two tasks: generative model evaluation (i.e. test set perplexity) and document classification. . Alternative ground truth: We propose Sentence Level Recurrent Topic Model (SLRTM) to tackle the limitations of the aforementioned works..
